articles.title: Injured, Shreyas Iyer Attends 'Iftaar' Party With Dhanashree Verma, Netizen Says 'Hope Chahal Is OK' - BollywoodShaadis.com

articles.content: Yuzvendra Chahal's wife, Dhanashree Verma has been leading the headlines ever since her pictures with cricketer, Shreyas Iyer, surfaced online. The viral picture is being circulated like wildfire on … [+2962 chars]
